_comments.minRelevanceThreshold: Minimum relevance score (0-100) for a skill to be loaded
_comments.maxSkillsPerCall: Maximum number of skills to load in a single call
_comments.maxTokensPerCall: Maximum total tokens from skills per call
_comments.keywordMatchWeight: Weight for keyword matching in relevance calculation (0-1)
_comments.agentMatchWeight: Weight for agent matching in relevance calculation (0-1)
_comments.priorityWeight: Weight for skill priority in relevance calculation (0-1)
_comments.fallbackToCoreSkills: Load core skills if detection finds nothing relevant
_comments.coreSkillsCount: Number of core skills to load as fallback
_comments.strategy: Loading strategy: on-demand, always, explicit, or never
_comments.maxDetectionTimeMs: Maximum time allowed for detection before fallback
